name: Cardiology & Heart Services
tagline: Advanced diagnostics, cath lab access, and rehab for every stage of heart care.
summary: Comprehensive preventive, interventional, and surgical heart care delivered by multidisciplinary teams.
highlights: Advanced imaging including 3D echo and cardiac MRI
Coordinated recovery plans with remote monitoring

name: Primary Care & Family Medicine
tagline: Personalized preventive care for adults and children with same-day access.
summary: Board-certified family medicine and internal medicine teams providing wellness, chronic condition management, and coordination with specialists.
highlights: Guaranteed same-week access for established patients

name: Cancer & Infusion Services
tagline: Whole-person oncology with clinical trials, infusion, and survivorship support.
summary: Medical, surgical, and radiation oncologists work together with nurse navigators, dietitians, and social workers to guide each patient.

name: Orthopedics & Sports Medicine
tagline: From weekend injuries to joint replacements, keep moving with confidence.
summary: Orthopedic surgeons, sports medicine physicians, and rehab therapists offering same-day injury clinics and advanced surgical options.

name: Behavioral Health & Wellness
tagline: Confidential counseling, psychiatry, and group programs for all ages.
summary: Integrated behavioral health with outpatient therapy, medication management, intensive outpatient programs, and digital tools.
highlights: Coordinated care with primary and specialty teams

name: Women's & Maternity Services
tagline: Personalized obstetrics, midwifery, and pelvic health services.
summary: High-risk obstetrics, certified nurse midwives, lactation consultants, and pelvic floor therapy in one coordinated program.
highlights: Birth plan workshops and tours weekly

name: Digestive Health & Endoscopy
tagline: Comprehensive GI evaluations with advanced endoscopy suites.
summary: Gastroenterologists, hepatologists, and dietitians collaborating for screenings, complex procedures, and nutrition management.
highlights: Capsule endoscopy and ERCP on site

name: Rehabilitation & Therapy
tagline: Physical, occupational, and speech therapy with specialty programs.
summary: Therapists deliver personalized plans including aquatic therapy, neuro rehab, and hand therapy, coordinated with referring physicians.
highlights: Progress tracking shared with referring clinicians
Dedicated concussion and vestibular therapy tracks
